question: Which parts of the body of women/men can allow to touch or kiss, and which parts are prohibited ??
answer:
QUESTION
Which parts of the body of women a men can allow to touch or kiss, and which parts are prohibited for men to touch or kiss and vice versa.
ANSWER


Share:
A man/woman can touch any part of each other's body. A man/woman can kiss
any part of each other's body besides the private parts (the breasts are not
included in private parts). It is not ethical to kiss the private parts of
each other's body. This may lead to oral sex which is regarded as makrooh
(reprehensible) according to the Jurists.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
